start_dialogue: ^Aiyoh! Already so late? Today is mahjong day!
^Better grab a quick bite first, can’t sit through a whole game with an empty stomach
^Auntie Siew Fong and the others must be tapping their fingers, wondering where I am
^Can’t start without me, but still… they’re sure to have something to say!
^Alright, Ah Mui, just a quick bite and then straight to mahjong
^Today, I’ll show them my strategy, maybe win enough for a kopi and kaya toast
